name: 4.2 "Woody Goes Belly Up" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 4 | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Norm and Vera.

	Norm didn't know what to get Vera because he forgot until the last minute. Someone suggested he go to the gas station and get some WD40. Then Cliff said, "An ashtray would be a better gift." Norm decided to give her an astray with a pack of cigarettes. When Cliff asked if Vera smoked, Norm replied, "Occasionally, after sex, sometimes during."

questions.text: How high was Frasier's bar tab?
questions.explanation:
$500.

	Sam told him that $500 was out of his price range. Frasier had become very depressed and unmotivated to do psychiatry work since Diane left him.

questions.text: What did Frasier get a job at Cheers doing in this episode?
questions.explanation:
janitor.

	Frasier told Sam he had hit rock bottom and was no longer worthy of practicing psychiatry. He asked to sweep the floors at Cheers and Sam agreed.

"Hey, my friend likes you."

	Cliff was not very good with women so his pick up line wasn't very good. He and Norm wanted to take Woody out to look for women but Woody turned them down.

questions.text: Why didn't Woody want to go look for women with Norm and Cliff?
questions.correct: He can't stop thinking about Beth.
options: He misses his mom in Indiana.
He cheated on his wife and feels to guilty to ever date again.
questions.explanation:
He can't stop thinking about Beth.

	Woody said he had been with Beth since they were children. They were dating when they were teens and broke up when Woody wanted to come to Boston and she wanted to stay in Indiana.

questions.text: What did the gang do for Woody?
options: flew in his mother from Indiana
hooked him up with a nice man
questions.explanation:
flew Beth in from Indiana.

	Woody was surprised to see Beth. He was even more surprised to see a small Beth.

questions.text: What did Woody say upon seeing Beth?
questions.explanation:
"Beth, you shrunk."

	Woody and Beth were both very heavy when they were younger. When they saw each other, each had lost a lot of weight because they didn't eat as much. However, when they got together, they started eating a lot again.

questions.text: What were Beth and Woody voted in high school as couple most likely to what?
questions.explanation:
explode.

	Woody explained that they were both very heavy in high school. It is hard to believe because both Woody and Beth were so in shape now.

questions.text: Who said she felt guilty about Frasier's job?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Frasier hit rock bottom because of Diane not marrying him. Part of the reason he wanted to work at Cheers was so she could see what she did to him. Most would believe that she left Frasier because she was in love with Sam, though at this point in the series, they are still not together.

questions.text: What didn't Woody and Beth want to talk about?
questions.explanation:
sex.

	Instead of talking about sex they just kept eating more and more. The scene when they discuss this is funny because they allude to it, but never say the word sex.
